content:
/>
X.iv.4.2.e
.
Effect of Renouncement of the Right to Disability Compensation on a Dependent’s Entitlement to DEA
Dependents entitled to DEA do
not
lose their entitlement when the Veteran on whose service the benefit is based renounces the right to disability compensation.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4  - Renouncements
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 4, Section None
